languages.text: "Не горюй, может тебя не сожгут, а в сервиторы отдадут. Хотя, кто его знает что хуже..."

traits.locale_text: "Не горюй, может тебя не сожгут, а в сервиторы отдадут. Хотя, кто его знает что хуже..."

languages.text: "Cheer up. Maybe you'll get servitored instead of burned. Although who knows which is worse..."
languages.original_text: "Не горюй, может тебя не сожгут, а в сервиторы отдадут. Хотя, кто его знает что хуже..."

languages.text: “高兴点吧，说不定你会被改造成机仆，不会被霍霍勺子。不过，谁知道哪个更糟呢……”
languages.original_text: "Cheer up. Maybe you'll get servitored instead of burned. Although who knows which is worse..."

traits.locale_text: “高兴点吧，说不定你会被改造成奴工，不会被霍霍勺子。不过，谁知道哪个更糟呢……”

languages.text: 「元気出せよ。燃やされるんじゃなくて、サーヴィター化されるかもしれないじゃないか。まぁ、どちらがマシかなんて、比べようがないが…」
languages.original_text: "Cheer up. Maybe you'll get servitored instead of burned. Although who knows which is worse..."

traits.locale_text: 「元気出せよ。燃やされるんじゃなくて、サーヴィター化されるかもしれないじゃないか。まぁ、どちらがマシかなんて、比べようがないが…」

languages.text: «Anímate. Lo mismo le toca ser servidor en vez del fuego. Aunque no sé qué es peor...».
languages.original_text: "Cheer up. Maybe you'll get servitored instead of burned. Although who knows which is worse..."

traits.locale_text: «Anímate. Lo mismo le toca ser servidor en vez del fuego. Aunque no sé qué es peor...».

languages.text: "Kopf hoch. Vielleicht werdet Ihr ja servitorisiert und nicht verbrannt. Wobei, wer weiß, was schlimmer ist ..."
languages.original_text: "Cheer up. Maybe you'll get servitored instead of burned. Although who knows which is worse..."

traits.locale_text: "Kopf hoch. Vielleicht werdet Ihr ja servitorisiert und nicht verbrannt. Wobei, wer weiß, was schlimmer ist ..."

languages.text: « Haut les cœurs. Avec un peu de chance, tu finiras servitor au lieu d'aller au bûcher. Enfin, c'est vrai qu'entre les deux, je sais pas ce qui est le pire... »
languages.original_text: "Cheer up. Maybe you'll get servitored instead of burned. Although who knows which is worse..."

traits.locale_text: « Haut les cœurs. Avec un peu de chance, tu finiras servitor au lieu d'aller au bûcher. Enfin, c'est vrai qu'entre les deux, je sais pas ce qui est le pire... »

languages.text: "Sıkma canını. Belki de yakılmazsın da hizmetörleştirilirsin. Tabii hangisi daha kötü, onu kimse bilmiyor."
languages.original_text: "Cheer up. Maybe you'll get servitored instead of burned. Although who knows which is worse..."

traits.locale_text: "Sıkma canını. Belki de yakılmazsın da hizmetörleştirilirsin. Tabii hangisi daha kötü, onu kimse bilmiyor."
